flow.descriptionCdata:
0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.00471004-a7f2-40a2-9957-a808dd782431.prompt=Process Instance ID 0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.12e8380a-d1ff-44ef-8eb2-80f6291ff7b0.prompt=Process Instance ID 0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.3c548cd5-4fa2-4feb-8754-ead5473c5d7e.prompt=Process Instance ID 0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.4191a329-25fb-43e5-9f88-727affa57256.prompt=Enter a value for value1 0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.52ce286d-461f-4f94-bfd4-54f86fb33006.description=
Retrieves a value from a list.

Inputs\:
list - A list to get the value from.
delimiter - the delimiter that separates values in the list.
index - the index of the value (Starting at 0) to retrieve from the list, or end for the last element, or end-1 for the second to last element.

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.

Returns\:
The value read from the list.
0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.561b20cf-8548-42ad-be73-95f2d572c9b0.prompt=User Identifier 0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.6864a8bc-97d1-48b5-8ffa-a99f986058cc.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.6893bf2b-0da6-472c-82f5-80d1a454c818.prompt=User Identifier 0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.6d64b1cc-1273-4ad6-b0bf-5bac0f3b3b86.prompt=User Identifier 0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.7b73846d-a55a-4baa-9a94-1ba0cad067f1.description=
Generates a random number.

Inputs\:
max - The maximum number that can be returned.
min - The minimum number that can be returned.

Responses\:
success - The operation completed Successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.

Returns\:
A random number between max and min (inclusive)
0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.8e094f04-8ef3-4654-866f-f196a562b197.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.8e8bcc30-8450-4385-abf7-51e9787c1f96.prompt=User Identifier 0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.9179e47b-e5ad-403b-90de-469fecae7cf6.description=
Returns the length of the list.

Inputs\:
delimiter - The list delimiter.
list - The list to be processed

Responses\:
success - The operation completed Successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.

Returns\:
The length of the list.
0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.a0564b4e-90a2-4b70-b1b6-ad32c4c6c8cf.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.a49096ee-f95e-4a01-8373-ee5032a31fab.prompt=Enter list of values separated by delimiter\: 0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.c176280b-dbb7-433e-a35c-4e9c0219677f.prompt=Process Instance ID 0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.c74bd492-d5b0-4ac4-b81e-af71c385a396.description=
Checks if a number or word is greater than another number or word. Word comparison is case-sensitive in alphabetical order.

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
value1 > value2

Responses\:
success - The boolean operation was evaluated to true.
failure - Something went wrong or the boolean operation returned false.
0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.ca7a9c78-5b83-4a55-9db4-832a8b60d8fb.prompt=Enter a value for index 0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.d76f92ef-f7fd-493c-86d1-45d6a7b2d550.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.dd774b90-7b72-473a-bbac-aa0b841d83e7.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.description=
Remove a Server from the Server Group. Random Server will be selected from the Server Group.

Inputs Parameters\:

 CSA_CONTEXT_ID – CSA Context Id
 CSA_PROCESS_ID – CSA Process Instance Id
 SVC_COMPONENT_ID - This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
 RSC_PROVIDER_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL - This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
 RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time.
  		Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE - This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
 RSC_POOL_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
 SVC_INSTANCE_ID - This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 PRN_COMPONENT_ID – This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
 REQ_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
 REQ_USER_ID - This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
 USR_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
 RSC_BINDING_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

Responses\:
 success - The operation completed successfully.
 failure - Something went wrong.
0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.e02a9888-088a-4806-a8c5-8379316da3af.prompt=Enter a value for list 0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.e4c42be3-6eb8-4371-bd72-6534d69735a0.description=
Subtracts two numbers

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
The difference of the two numbers.

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
0d2af5e4-1e59-4787-819c-2ccb7689b475.ec654acf-19d3-4671-a869-26b5523d5ce7.prompt=Enter a value for value1
flow.name: vCenter Simple Compute Linux - Server Group Flex-in Server

staticBinding.value: Removing server from the server group
Instance has been removed from your subscription ${subscriptionName}

Greetings,
The email confirms that the following server instance has been removed successfully.
Server Group : ${serverGroupname} Server : ${hostname}
For help and support, please visit HP CSA Consumer portal.
Sincerely, HP CSA Team
Cannot remove server. Server group has reached minimum server count
